name: Light's Champion
description: Release the rejuvenating energies of your staff to swirl around you, healing you or a nearby ally for 2904 Health every 1 second for 5 seconds.  Any friendly target you heal gains Major Force for 8 seconds, increasing their Critical Damage by 20%.
effectLines: Any friendly target healed gains Major Force, increasing Critical Damage dealt.
coefDescription: Release the rejuvenating energies of your staff to swirl around you, healing you or a nearby ally for $1 Health every 1 second for 5 seconds.  Any friendly target you heal gains Major Force for 8 seconds, increasing their Critical Damage by 20%.
rawDescription:
Release the rejuvenating energies of your staff to swirl around you, healing you or a nearby ally for <<1>> Health every <<2>> for <<3>>.

Any friendly target you heal gains Major Force for <<4>>, increasing their Critical Damage by <<5>>.
